Name: Prepare
Desc: Remove a Debuff from any player per stack.
Desc2: At 1 Stack, gain Shield. At 2 Stacks, gain Strong. At 3 Stacks, gain both Shield and Strong

Name: Heist
Desc: Take 2 Stolen resources per stack.
Desc2: Every two stacks, gain 1 resource of any kind.

Name: Gust
Desc: Deal 1 damage. Move Army left or right.
Desc2: Gain 1 Sailor

Name: Flaming Vortex
Desc: Gain 1 Smith and 1 Armorer
Desc2: Deal 4 damage to the Army that has the most health

Name: Hurricane
Desc: Deal 4 damage. Each stack applies to a different Army.
Desc2: :water-income:

Name: Scry
Desc: Reveal the top X spell cards (X is stacks), and return them to the top of the deck in any order you choose.
Desc2: If the Army has Confusion, deal 2 damage per stack.

Name: Necromancy
Desc: Take 1 Damage and Gain 1 Mage recruitment per stack.
Desc2: Take 1 Damage and Gain 2 Worker recruitment per stack.

Name: Homing Missile
Desc: Deal 3 Ranged damage per stack
Desc2: If targeting Dark Mage, deal 5 Ranged damage

Name: Magma Storm
Desc: Deal 5 damage per stack
Desc2: :dig: :dig: per stack.

Name: Vine Whip
Desc: Deal 1 damage per stack.
Desc2: Gain 1 Druid per stack

Name: Parry
Desc: Deal 1 damage. After retaliation, gain 1 Riposte per stack, continuing to next player.
Desc2: If you have Riposte, deal 4 damage and remove Riposte

Name: Trebuchet
Desc: Ranged: 2 Damage
Desc2: Gain 1 Captain

Name: Squall
Desc: Deal 2 damage
Desc2: Remove Burning. At 3 stacks, also remove Burning from a neighbor

Name: Flame Gambit
Desc: For each stack, guess a number 1-6. Roll a D6. If one of your guesses is correct, deal damage equal to the number of stacks.
Desc2: For each stack, guess a number 1-6. Roll a D6. If one of your guesses is correct, gain 1 Mage for every 2 stacks.

Name: Fireball
Desc: Melee: Deal 4 Damage per stack. Caster takes Burning.
Desc2: Ranged: Deal 3 damage per stack.

Name: Eruption
Desc: 3 Ranged Damage per stack.
Desc2: :dig: :dig: :dig: per stack

Name: Shield of Elements
Desc: Gain Shield, continuing to the next player without a shield,
Desc2: During Attack, if this has at least 1 stack, you may clear all resources on this spell to prevent the next debuff applied to you.

Name: Water Cannon
Desc: Deal 3 damage per stack
Desc2: Deal 2 Damage to 2 different Armies per stack.

Name: Feast
Desc: Gain 1 Worker per stack
Desc2: Gain 1 Mage per stack

Name: Rapid Growth
Desc: Deal 1 damage per stack
Desc2: Sow 1 seed per stack

Name: Plentiful Roots
Desc: Deal 1 damage per stack. Deal an extra 2 damage if the army is Rooted.
Desc2: Gain 1 Worker. Apply Rooted.

Name: Rock Shield
Desc: Gain Shield, continuing to next player on more stacks.
Desc2: Melee: If you have a Shield token, deal 3 damage per stack, and break the Shield.

Name: Brain Food
Desc: :research: :research:
Desc2: Gain 1 Protege

Name: Shield Bash
Desc: If you have a Shield token, deal 3 Melee damage per stack, and break your shield.
Desc2: Any player gains a Shield token, per stack.

Name: Clay Hut
Desc: Remove one debuff per stack, continuing to next player.
Desc2: Gain 1 Worker

Name: Cleanse
Desc: Deal 1 Melee damage
Desc2: Remove a Debuff per stack. Also, remove Burning from any player per stack.

Name: Flood
Desc: Apply Vulnerable. Each stack applies Vulnerable to a different Army.
Desc2: If Army has Vulnerable, apply Confusion
